## LineJoin enumeration

Determines how lines are rendered at intersections of line segments.

```csharp
public enum LineJoin
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Miter | `0` | Sharp corner. |
| Round | `1` | Rounded corner. |
| Bevel | `2` | Diagonal corner. |
